Title: Wholesale prices in Japan rise more than expected in October
Description: The Central Bank of Japan announced on Tuesday that the prices of (wholesale) service producers rose over the past month.

Title: The Manhattan District Attorney resigns. Trump vowed to fire him
Description: Federal Prosecutor for the District of Manhattan in New York, Damien Williams, announced on Monday that he will resign from his position on December 13, that is, 5 weeks before the inauguration of President-elect Donald Trump, who had vowed to dismiss him.

Title: Gold stabilizes following Trump's trade threats
Description: Gold prices stabilized during early Tuesday trading, after falling three percent in the previous session, as they received support from increased demand for safe havens after US President-elect Donald Trump pledged to impose customs duties on all imports from Canada, Mexico, and China.

Description: Israeli Defense Minister Yisrael Katz said on Monday that he will work intensively and quickly to build a separation fence on the border with Jordan, according to what Channel 7 reported.

Title: The first comment from Hamas on the Hezbollah-Israel 'agreement'
Description: The prominent leader of the Hamas movement in Lebanon, Osama Hamdan, stated that the movement will support a ceasefire between Israel and its Lebanese ally Hezbollah, despite Hezbollah's previous pledges to end the fighting in Lebanon only if the war in Gaza stops.

Title: The dollar crushes these currencies after Trump's trade threats
Description: The dollar rose broadly against other major currencies in Asian trading on Tuesday, after US President-elect Donald Trump said he would sign an executive order imposing 25 percent tariffs on all products coming into the United States from Mexico and Canada.
